summary: An Ordinance providing for the changing and establishing of the curb grades on Mercer Street, from Fourth Avenue North to Terry Avenue North; Republican Street, from Fifth Avenue North to Terry Avenue North; Harrison Street, Thomas Street and John Street, each from Fifth Avenue North to Westlake Avenue North; Fifth Avenue North, from Republican Street to Roy Street; Taylor Avenue, from Denny Way to Roy Street; Sixth Avenue North, from Denny Way to Roy Street; Seventh Avenue North, from Denny Way to Roy Street; Dexter Avenue, from Denny Way to Roy Street; Eighth Avenue North, from John Street to Aloha Street; Ninth Avenue North, from Denny Way to Westlake Avenue North; Westlake Avenue North, from Harrison Street to Valley Street; Broad Street, from Fifth Avenue North to Mercer Street, and from Eighth Avenue North to Westlake Avenue North; Roy Street, from Dexter Avenue to Westlake Avenue North; Valley Street, from Dexter Avenue to Eighth Avenue North; Aloha Street, from Dexter Avenue to Eighth Avenue North; Ward Street, from Dexter Avenue to Westlake Avenue North; and repealing all ordinances or parts of ordinances in conflict therewith.
